author: hwright
msg: Properly fetch and set all the props if needed when doing a repos->repos copy.
(path_driver_info_t): Remove mergeinfo member, add props member.
(repos_to_repos_copy): If we fetched mergeinfo, we fetch all the
properties and fold the mergeinfo into them.
